title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Die Veneris, 13. Octob. 1648.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings-Head in the Old-Bayley,
notes: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.

Officers who have served the Parliament, and have arrears due, are not to leave their counties to come to the Houses, who intend to provide complete satisfaction for them. This to be printed and sent to the Sheriffs for publication -- Cf. Steele.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 16th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
